🐸🤢🍽️😳: Frogs can throw up their entire stomachs to clean them out, then swallow it back down.
🐸❄️➡️🌞: Some frogs can freeze solid in winter and thaw back to life in spring.
🐸👀🔍🫀: The glass frog has translucent skin, so you can see its organs through its belly.
🐸💧🌿🌍: Frogs absorb water through their skin, so they don't need to drink.
🐸⚔️🛡️🎖️: A group of frogs is called an 'army,' but they don't usually go into battle.
